Tekmovalka iz šova Zvezde plešejo dala odpoved
Pevka Klara Lorger, ki je plesala tudi v šovu Zvezde plešejo, menjala službo. Ostaja zaposlena v zdravstvu, a triizmensko delo v bolnišnici jo je izčrpavalo.
02 Nov 2019, 08:56 by Mojca Marot



Klara ostaja v medicini in tudi pevka Ansambla Vihar. FOTO: facebook



Takole se je poslovila od svojih sodelavcev še na žuru. FOTO: facebook



Klara na svoj zadnji delovni dan med sodelavci v celjski bolnišnici. FOTO: facebook


»Drži, res sem se poslovila od svojih prečudovitih sodelavcev in sodelavk na oddelku za žilno kirurgijo, kjer sem preživela prvo desetletje delovne dobe. Zdaj sem se od bolnišnice poslovila in šla drugam, kjer bo zame, za mojo družino in ansambel bolj prijazen delovni čas. Preprosto nisem več zdržala tempa na tri izmene, z delovnimi vikendi vred, dvema malima hčerkicama in še petjem v ansamblu,« nam je zaupala Klara Lorger, ki smo jo videli na plesnem parketu šova Zvezde plešejo.


Klara na svoj zadnji delovni dan med sodelavci v celjski bolnišnici. FOTO: facebook

Pobarali smo jo, kaj pomeni to slovo, potem ko je na družabnem omrežju objavila fotografijo, pod katero je zapisala: »Moj prvi, čisto ta pravi tim, na katerega sem neizmerno ponosna. Z vami sem rastla, da sem danes to, kar sem. Hvala vam za vsa ta leta, da sem lahko bila del vsega lepega, hudega, veselega, premnogokrat napornega vsakdanjika. Nikoli vas ne bom pozabila. Imejte se radi, poslušajte se in borite se naprej! Rada vas imam!«


Takole se je poslovila od svojih sodelavcev še na žuru. FOTO: facebook

Klara nam je povedala še, da ostaja v zdravstvu, saj z veseljem opravlja delo medicinske sestre, le bolnišnici je zaradi napornega triizmenskega delovnika pomahala v slovo. »Priznam, da sem se v tem poklicu kar našla, rada ga imam, pa še dodatno se izobražujem na visoki zdravstveni šoli v Celju,« nam je zaupala v začetku leta, ko je razkrila, da mineva deset let, odkar se je v bolnišnici zaposlila. Povedala je, da se je srečevala z različnimi situacijami, lepimi in manj lepimi.Z vami sem rastla, da sem danes to, kar sem.»Kot medicinska sestra sem delala seveda tudi ob vikendih in ponoči, zato se je zgodilo, da sem šla iz službe kdaj direktno na oder. In tudi obratno, z odra direktno v službo,« pravi Klara, ki se je pacientom pogosto zdela od nekod znana. »Nekateri so kar precej razmišljali o tem, kdo sem in kam naj me dajo, med hospitalizacijo pa so le ugotovili, da me poznajo kot pevko Ansambla Vihar. In seveda tudi smeha ni manjkalo. A sem vsakemu vedno rekla, da se bomo drugič raje srečali na kakšni veselici in naj me raje tam pocukajo za rokav,« nam je še povedala Klara, ki ostaja zvesta glasbi, saj ima enega najlepših vokalov na naši narodno-zabavni sceni. Na novem delovnem mestu ji želimo veliko zadovoljstva in naj jo obkrožajo čudoviti sodelavci.

The competitor from the Stars show is dancing to quit
Singer Klara Lorger, who also danced in the show The Stars Dance, switched jobs. She remains a healthcare worker, but three-shift hospital work has exhausted her.
02 Nov 2019, 08:56 by Mojca Marot



Klara remains in medicine and is also the singer of the Vihar Ensemble. PHOTO: facebook



This is how she said goodbye to her colleagues at a party. PHOTO: facebook



Klara on her last working day among the staff at the Celje hospital. PHOTO: facebook


"Yes, I did say goodbye to my wonderful colleagues at the Vascular Surgery Department, where I spent the first decade of my working life. Now I said goodbye to the hospital and went elsewhere, where it would be more enjoyable working hours for my family and the ensemble. I just couldn't keep up the pace on three shifts, with work weekends, two little daughters and even more singing in the ensemble, "confided Klara Lorger, who we saw on the dance floor of the Star Dance show.


Klara on her last working day among the staff at the Celje hospital. PHOTO: facebook

We asked her what this letter means after she posted a photo on social media, captioning it: “My first, quite this real team, which I am immensely proud of. I grew up with you to be who I am today. Thank you for all these years that I have been able to be a part of all the beautiful, fierce, happy, many times a tiring daily routine. I'll never forget you. Love each other, listen and fight! I love you!"


This is how she said goodbye to her colleagues at a party. PHOTO: facebook

Klara also told us that she remains in health care because she is happy to do the work of a nurse, only because of the exhausting three-shift staff she waved goodbye. "I admit that I have found myself in this profession, I love it, and I am further educated at the Celje high medical school," she confided to us at the beginning of the year, when she revealed that it had been ten years since she had been hospitalized employed. She said that she faced different situations, beautiful and less beautiful. I grew up with you to be what I am today. "As a nurse, I also worked, of course, on weekends and at night, so it happened that I went from service ever directly to the stage. And vice versa, from the stage directly to work, ”says Klara, who often seemed familiar to patients from somewhere. “Some people were thinking a lot about who I was and where to put me, but during hospitalization, they just found out that they knew me as a singer of the Vihar Ensemble. And of course there was no laughing. But I always told everyone that we would rather meet at a party for the second time and that they would rather knock me there by the sleeve, "said Klara, who remains true to the music, as she has one of the most beautiful vocals on our national-entertainment scene. We wish her a lot of satisfaction in her new job and be surrounded by wonderful colleagues.
